review_info.instructions: 请审核以下数据项，将approved字段设为true/false

data.subject: DoDAF
data.evidence: The Department of Defense Architecture Framework (DoDAF) provides a comprehensive approach to enterprise architecture development.

data.subject: Operational View
data.evidence: The Operational View captures the operational aspects of the enterprise.

data.subject: System View
data.evidence: The System View describes the systems and interconnections supporting operational activities.

data.subject: Technical View
data.evidence: The Technical View provides the technical standards and rules governing the implementation.
